scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA2][Infrastructure] - Electrical background work Room G244 A&B

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. This will affect availability of your servers. Start time : 06/03/2025 21:00 UTC End time : 07/03/2025 00:00 UTC Service impact : Servers will be unavailable during the maintenance operation. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out an electrical upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters. To protect your data from any impact, we advise you to first restart your machines in rescue mode (How to activate and use rescue mode) before the operation mentioned above. Every client concerned by this maintenance will be contacted. Thank you for your understanding.

Thank you for your understanding.

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. This will affect availability of your servers. Start time : 17/03/2025 21:00 UTC End time : 18/03/2025 00:00 UTC Service impact : Servers will be unavailable during the maintenance operation. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out an electrical upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters. To protect your data from any impact, we advise you to first restart your machines in rescue mode (How to activate and use rescue mode) before the operation mentioned above. Every client concerned by this maintenance will be contacted. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of the continuous improvement of our services, we have planned an evolution of the network infrastructure on the Gravelines site on March 17, 2025. Start time : 17/03/2025 22:00 UTC End time : 18/03/2025 05:00 UTC Service impact : Some network perturbation can be observe during the 3rd step for a duration of 5 to 10 min Service improvement : Network scaling capacity This maintenance will be structured around three phases, described in detail below: Step 1 : preparation of the maintenance operation (about 2 hours) Step 2 : implementation of the new infrastructure (about 3 hours) Step 3 : test and activation of the new infrastructure (about3 hours) We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding as we work to improve our services. Thank you for your understanding.
